TopicTitle: Building of a Munar Base w/ Mission Log (Mon-Thur 9am-5pm PST) ( ON AIR )

Articles.Content:
Building of a munar base using B9 Aerotech, Kethane, Kas, Lazor, EPL, MechJeb2, Firespitter, Boat Parts, and Docking Struts.

All building will be done by "welding" parts together.

http://ustre.am/11W2r
